pkgmetadata.longdescription: Exploratory and Descriptive Event-Based Data Analysis // Functions for exploratory and descriptive analysis of event based data. Can be used to import and export Xes-files, the IEEE eXtensible Event Stream standard (see http://standards.ieee.org/findstds/standard/1849-2016.html for more info). Provides methods for describing and selecting process data, and for preparing event log data for process mining.
